title: League not able to use internet
body: Guys im using personal hot spot and when im downloading the update (although its a 4G connection) the download speed is only 1kb/s for the client and 5 MB/s for any thing else...what should i do?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you still experiencing this issue?

Could you try connecting to the internet via a wired connection and then attempting to download the game, do you still experience any issues?
